bicome.logic.manager

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bicome.logic.manager.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that manages the interactions between the World class and the controller classes
    Version:
    9.5.2018
    Author:
    Ismail Ilter Sezan
